action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several pixelated shapes on a white background. There is a purple cross shape near the top left, two green L-shaped figures, one below the purple cross and one to the right of it, two orange L-shaped figures, one below the green L-shape on the right and one near the bottom left, and two pink shapes on the right side, one resembling a P and the other resembling a T.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There are red, purple, yellow, and orange shapes scattered around the image. The shapes include T-shaped, L-shaped, and straight pieces.
